description: Skill activation triggers for Claude Code. Controls when skills automatically suggest or block actions.

project-guidelines.description: Generic project development guidelines covering structure, coding standards, testing, deployment, and best practices

enforcement_types.suggest: Skill suggestion appears but doesn't block execution
enforcement_types.block: Requires skill to be used before proceeding (guardrail)

priority_levels.low: Optional - Trigger only for explicit matches

customization.pathPatterns: Adjust to match your project structure once you know your tech stack
customization.keywords: Add domain-specific terms relevant to your project (e.g., 'database', 'API', 'frontend')
customization.intentPatterns: Use regex for flexible user intent matching
customization.contentPatterns: Add patterns to trigger on specific code (e.g., 'import React', 'prisma.', 'router.')
